ids_info.name: pellets
ids_info.description: Description of pellets launched into the plasma

pellets/time_slice.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: pellets/time_slice
IDS: pellets
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: pellets
FIELD_NAME: time_slice
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: pellets -> time_slice

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[pellets]: Description of pellets launched into the plasma

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/size.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/size
IDS: pellets
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 4
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 5
PARENT_CONTAINER: pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape
FIELD_NAME: size
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: pellets -> time_slice -> pellet -> shape -> size

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Size of the pellet in the various dimensions, depending on the shape type. Spherical pellets: size(1) is the radius of the pellet. Cylindrical pellets: size(1) is the radius and size(2) is the height of the cylinder. Rectangular pellets: size(1) is the height, size(2) is the width and size(3) is the length

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[pellets]: Description of pellets launched into the plasma
CONTAINER[pellets/time_slice]: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma.
CONTAINER[pellets/time_slice/pellet]: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time
CONTAINER[pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape]: Initial shape of a pellet at launch
